name: RoehamptonUni
text: 📝5 ways to make the most of your placement year📝 *nl*  *nl* We spoke to Rafa, a third year BSc Human Resource Management student who completed a one-year placement at IBM, on his top tips to make the most of the opportunity of a placement year. *nl*  *nl* Read more: https://t.co/q6Wz2uq0Du
